verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <S%H7892><s%> A Song הַֽמַּעֲל֗וֹת <S%H4609><s%> of degrees לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> of David שָׂ֭מַחְתִּי <S%H8055><s%> I was glad בְּאֹמְרִ֣ים <S%H559><s%> when they said לִ֑י בֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD נֵלֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> go
עֹ֭מְדוֹת <S%H5975><s%> shall stand הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become רַגְלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H7272><s%> Our feet בִּ֝שְׁעָרַ֗יִךְ <S%H8179><s%> within thy gates יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> O Jerusalem
יְרוּשָׁלִַ֥ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem הַבְּנוּיָ֑ה <S%H1129><s%> is builded כְּ֝עִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> as a city שֶׁחֻבְּרָה־ <S%H2266><s%> that is compact לָּ֥הּ יַחְדָּֽו׃ <S%H3162><s%> together

שֶׁשָּׁ֨ם <S%H8033><s%> Whither עָל֪וּ <S%H5927><s%> go up שְׁבָטִ֡ים <S%H7626><s%> the tribes שִׁבְטֵי־ <S%H7626><s%> the tribes יָ֭הּ <S%H3050><s%> of the LORD עֵד֣וּת <S%H5715><s%> unto the testimony לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְ֝הֹד֗וֹת <S%H3034><s%> to give thanks לְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> unto the name יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For שָׁ֨מָּה ׀ <S%H8033><s%> there יָשְׁב֣וּ <S%H3427><s%> For there are set כִסְא֣וֹת <S%H3678><s%> thrones לְמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> of judgment כִּ֝סְא֗וֹת <S%H3678><s%> the thrones לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house דָּוִֽיד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David
שַׁ֭אֲלוּ <S%H7592><s%> Pray שְׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> for the peace יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem יִ֝שְׁלָ֗יוּ <S%H7951><s%> they shall prosper אֹהֲבָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H157><s%> that love
יְהִֽי־ <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁל֥וֹם <S%H7965><s%> Peace בְּחֵילֵ֑ךְ <S%H2426><s%> be within thy walls שַׁ֝לְוָ֗ה <S%H7962><s%> [and] prosperity בְּאַרְמְנוֹתָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H759><s%> within thy palaces

לְ֭מַעַן <S%H4616><s%> the sake אַחַ֣י <S%H251><s%> For my brethren וְרֵעָ֑י <S%H7453><s%> and companions' אֲדַבְּרָה־ <S%H1696><s%> sakes I will now say נָּ֖א <S%H4994><s%> will now שָׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> Peace בָּֽךְ׃

לְ֭מַעַן <S%H4616><s%> the sake בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> Because of the house יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God אֲבַקְשָׁ֖ה <S%H1245><s%> I will seek ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> thy good לָֽךְ׃
